metas.name: Hotaru no Yomeiri
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Romance Tags:Josei/Yandere/Prostitution/Assassins/Historical/Heterosexual On the surface, Satoko has it all—she’s beautiful, the daughter of a nobleman, and at a prime age for marriage. Unfortunately, she is also quite ill and only has a short time left to live. Before she can secure a marriage that will redeem her worth in her family’s eyes, she finds herself the target of the mysterious assassin Shinpei, and her plans are put in jeopardy. In order to save herself, she makes a desperate proposal—of marriage! When it comes to love, however, Shinpei takes “until death do we part” seriously.

(Source: VIZ Media)

metas.name: Dragon Ball Super: Beerus
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure Tags:Shounen/Gods/Martial Arts/Super Power/Henshin/Male Protagonist/Aliens Dragon Ball Super: Beerus, a project that was started a few years ago, is the newly ENHANCED edition of the anime Dragon Ball Super. ENHANCED by the latest visual expression, every scene, especially the battle scenes, is even more immersive, providing a more faithful and detailed reproduction of the original work by Akira Toriyama, and it will deliver a quality that is sure to fully satisfy audiences.

(Source: Dragon Ball Official Site)

metas.name: Kyoufu Collector
metas.description:
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Supernatural Tags:Urban Fantasy/Youkai Urban legends come to life…Everyone’s heard an urban legend before, but few have ever come face-to-face with one. These phenomena are everywhere, existing in the shadows of reality. More and more of them have been appearing in the wake of the faceless kid sighted all over Japan. If you see her or one of the urban legends she brings―pray the boy in the red hood finds you before it’s too late. You won’t stand a chance on your own. But with his help, you may just live to see another day…

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: U-17 WORLD CUP Kesshou Member Ketteisen
metas.description: Genres: Action, Comedy, Sports Tags:Foreign/Ensemble Cast/Male Protagonist/Primarily Male Cast/Shounen/Tennis Sequel to Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: U-17 WORLD CUP SEMIFINAL.

metas.name: Pan Dorobou
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy Tags:Crime Kadokawa announced on June 9th, 2025 that Keiko Shibata's Pan Dorobou (Bread Thief) picture book will have an anime adaptation. The announcement did not reveal the anime's format. The picture books center on a piece of bread that also steals bread from bakeries in the city.

(Source: Anime News Network)

metas.name: Kyouran Reijou Nia Liston
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy Tags: A great hero lies undefeated on her deathbed, regretting that she never found a foe who could take her down. She never intended to meet her fate anywhere other than on the battlefield, and her peaceful demise has her wishing desperately that things could have been different... But when she suddenly comes to in the body of the young, frail Nia Liston, she’s got an all-new fight ahead of her. Nia is a sickly child, meaning she has a long way to go before she’s in fighting form. Now that she’s been given a second shot at life, however, she’s determined to get what she wants. She’s going to live—and die—for battle this time! Make way for the Merciless Maiden!

(Source: J-Novel Club)
